title: Public Relations
introDescription: Partner with top crypto and mainstream publications such as CoinDesk, Cointelegraph, Bloomberg, Nasdaq and more to elevate your projectâ€™s credibility and PR. We also feature PR articles on CryptoNewsLine and social blogs for an increased audience and maximum outreach.
processDescription: The process of creating your marketing strategy will vary depending on your specific goals and needs, however these are some of the steps you can expect us to take:

processList.label: Tailored Solutions
processList.text: At the beginning of our engagement, we will present a range of PR package options, each designed to meet different needs according to your budget. These packages will be tailored to your project's specific goals, audience, and industry.

processList.label: Uncovering Details
processList.text: Before we begin creating a PR campaign, we will schedule a discovery call with you to discuss your project in more detail. During this call, we will work together to uncover your project's specific goals, target audience, and key messaging.

processList.label: Narrative Creation
processList.text: Our editors will create the narrative and campaign details which are confirmed by your team.

processList.label: Crafting the Perfect Piece
processList.text: Our in-house content writer will then draft and edit the respective articles with the approved content until satisfaction is achieved.

processList.label: The Right Audience
processList.text: The approved content and banners will be pitched to the preferred publications.

processList.label: Launch Time
processList.text: Once the pieces have been placed, we will work to ensure that they are published and syndicated in a timely manner.

processList.label: In the Loop
processList.text: After 2 weeks, we will provide you with a report on the performance of the campaign. This report will include metrics such as the reach of the pieces, engagement rates, and any conversions that were generated as a result of the campaign.
